mewara maha mathiwaranayen eksath janatha nidahas sandhanayata 2/3ka balayak himiwuwath janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha kisidineka je.aar. jayawardhana kenaku nowana bawa waraya ha guwan sewa amathi chamal rajapaksha mahatha pawasayi.mahinda chinthanaya thula kisidineka eekadhipathi palanayak athi nowana bawada amathiwaraya prakasha keleya.mahinda chinthanaya yanu gamata hithakara dakmak sahithawa deshiya chinthanaya, thakshanaya, danumata mulikathwaya demin gama godanangimata awasthawa salasana atharama samata samanawa salakima bawada amathiwaraya wadiduratath pawasiya.rajapakshawarun kisi dineka lankeya deshapalanaye eekadhipathiwarun nowana bawa pawasu amathiwaraya, aanduwa 2/3ka balayak laba gaththada ee thula kisiwekuta adahas prakasha kirime ha nidahaswa kriya kirime balaya ahimi nowana bawada hethema kiya.pasugiya warsha hathara athulatha rate siyalu dena ekamuthu karamin mahinda rajapaksha aanduwa pahadili winiwidabhawayakin kriya kirima janatha wishwasayata hethu wu bawada amathiwaraya pawasiya.wipakshaye saha janatha wimukthi peramune atham deshapalana nayakayan wisin rajaya aarambhakara athi sanwardhana - aarthika kriyadamaya janathawa idiriye upahasayen yuthuwa padanam wirahitha wiwechana idiripath kirima thama pilikulen yuthuwa hela dakina bawada hethema kiya.hambanthota jathyanthara waraya idikirima pilibanda wipaksha nayaka ranil wikramasinha mahatha janathawata idiripath karana sawadya prakashawalata pilithurak dimata, idiri agosthu masaye, hambanthota waraya thatakaye bhagayak jalayen purawa me aithihasika awasthawedi dahas sankhyatha janathawata sathuta bhukthiwindima sandaha waraya thatakaye diya namata awasthawa laba dena bawath, ema awasthawata ranil wikramasinha mahathata da sahabhagi wana lesath amathiwaraya aaradhana kara sitiyeya.amathiwaraya me adahas palakele pasugiya 24 da, pawathi madhya hamuwakadiya.
